god_message: Mortal, you stand in the presence of Zeus, the sky father and king of Olympus. What boldness brings you to my throne?

choice_1.choice_description: Express your unwavering loyalty to Zeus and the Olympian order.
choice_1.god_message: Loyalty is the foundation upon which the heavens rest. Your fealty is noted.

choice_1.choice_description: Seek Zeus's counsel to ensure victory in the war.
choice_1.god_message: Counsel from Olympus can turn the tide of any conflict. Your request shows wisdom.

choice_1.choice_description: Offer to build temples in Zeus's honor across the land.
choice_1.god_message: Temples as monuments to faith are a compelling tribute. I shall consider your dedication.

choice_2.choice_description: Pledge to spread Zeus's glory and tales of his victories.
choice_2.god_message: Tales of glory resonate through eternity, yet action solidifies legacy. I will contemplate your words.

choice_3.choice_description: Demand Zeus's intervention, citing the fate of Olympus.
choice_3.god_message: Demands upon a god, especially of Olympus, reflect neither wisdom nor respect. Ponder your approach.

choice_2.choice_description: Request Zeus to unleash his thunderbolts against your enemies.
choice_2.god_message: The thunderbolt is a symbol of ultimate authority and power, not to be wielded lightly.

choice_1.choice_description: Vow to act as Zeus's mortal instrument of justice.
choice_1.god_message: Justice through a mortal agent? An intriguing notion. I will consider your offer.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest this show of force would deter future rebellions.
choice_2.god_message: Deterrence is but one facet of rule. True leadership inspires loyalty, not fear. I shall ponder this.

choice_3.choice_description: Insist that without his intervention, all is lost.
choice_3.god_message: Desperation does not become a leader, nor does it sway the will of Zeus. Reflect upon your words.

choice_3.choice_description: Inquire about Zeus's own battles and draw parallels to your struggle.
choice_3.god_message: The chronicles of the divine are filled with conflict and resolution, a mirror to mortal endeavors.

choice_1.choice_description: Show reverence for Zeus's wisdom and seek to learn from his victories.
choice_1.god_message: Reverence for the past and a desire to learn are the first steps towards wisdom. Your path is wise.

choice_2.choice_description: Pledge to emulate Zeus's leadership in your own campaign.
choice_2.god_message: To emulate the divine is a noble goal, yet one must understand their own limits. I will consider your ambition.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim you could surpass Zeus's achievements with his support.
choice_3.god_message: Ambition should be tempered with humility. Hubris has been the downfall of many. Contemplate this.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer a grand sacrifice to demonstrate your devotion and the gravity of your cause.
choice_2.god_message: Sacrifice is a testament to faith and desperation. The scale of your offering will be weighed.

choice_1.choice_description: Sacrifice your prized possession as a symbol of your dedication.
choice_1.god_message: A personal sacrifice of great value demonstrates profound dedication. I shall ponder your devotion.

choice_1.choice_description: Promise to enact laws that honor Zeus and enforce his worship.
choice_1.god_message: Laws that ensure reverence for the divine contribute to the order of the world. Your proposal holds merit.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest the sacrifice will ensure Zeus's favor in battle.
choice_2.god_message: Favor is earned through actions and character, not just sacrifice. Reflect upon your intentions.

choice_3.god_message: No act can guarantee victory. The fates weave complex patterns, influenced by many. Consider your hubris.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer a portion of the war spoils to Zeus's temples.
choice_2.god_message: Contributions to my temples bolster the faith and the spirit of the people. Your offer is noted.

choice_1.choice_description: Pledge a significant share of the spoils, dedicating a victory feast to Zeus.
choice_1.god_message: A feast in my honor, celebrating victory and spoils, is a grand gesture. I will consider your tribute.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest the wealth will make the priesthood in Zeus's temples unrivaled.
choice_2.god_message: Wealth for the sake of power does not align with divine wisdom. The heart of your offer will be examined.

choice_3.choice_description: Boast that this will make Zeus the richest of all gods.
choice_3.god_message: Wealth is not the measure of a god's power or influence. Ponder the values you espouse.

choice_3.choice_description: Propose a grand festival in Zeus's name to rally the people and unite them under his banner.
choice_3.god_message: Festivals can indeed unite people, stir hearts, and strengthen faith. Your proposal is intriguing.

choice_1.choice_description: Ensure the festival highlights Zeus's role as protector and king of the gods.
choice_1.god_message: Highlighting my protection and leadership can serve to inspire and fortify the spirits of many. A worthy plan.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest competitions of strength and wisdom in Zeus's honor.
choice_2.god_message: Competitions can be a testament to human endeavor and spirit. I will consider how they reflect my virtues.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that the festival will surpass the splendor of Olympus itself.
choice_3.god_message: Aspiring to surpass the divine in splendor is a bold claim. True magnificence is found in reverence, not opulence.

choice_3.choice_description: Invoke Zeus's sense of justice, arguing that the war is a fight against tyranny and for the freedom of mankind.
choice_3.god_message: Justice is a pillar of divine law, and tyranny its antithesis. Your words strike at the heart of order.

choice_1.choice_description: Pledge to establish a fair and just society under Zeus's guidance.
choice_1.god_message: A society built on justice and guided by the divine is a beacon of light. Your vision will be contemplated.

choice_1.choice_description: Propose a covenant between gods and mortals to uphold justice.
choice_1.god_message: A covenant is a profound bond. The concept of a shared commitment to justice is noble. I shall ponder your words.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest erecting monuments to Zeus's justice in every city.
choice_2.god_message: Monuments are symbols, but justice requires action and principle. Your intent is noted, yet actions speak louder.

choice_3.choice_description: Declare that without Zeus, justice will falter and chaos will reign.
choice_3.god_message: To say justice hinges solely upon one is to misunderstand its nature. Reflect on the balance of power and responsibility.

choice_2.choice_description: Offer to be Zeus's champion, enacting his will on the battlefield.
choice_2.god_message: A champion acts not only with strength but with wisdom and justice. Your offer bears consideration.

choice_1.choice_description: Vow to bring Zeus's enemies to trial before him.
choice_1.god_message: Bringing enemies to justice under divine scrutiny is a testament to your commitment to order. A judicious offer.

choice_2.choice_description: Promise swift retribution against those who oppose Zeus's will.
choice_2.god_message: Retribution must be balanced with justice. Swift actions often overlook the scales. I will reflect on your methods.

choice_3.choice_description: Insist that all who stand against you shall be smitten in Zeus's name.
choice_3.god_message: To smite without judgment is tyranny disguised as zeal. Caution, mortal, lest you become what you oppose.

choice_3.choice_description: Argue that the gods must intervene directly to restore balance and protect the innocent.
choice_3.god_message: Intervention by the divine is a matter of great consequence, altering the balance of fate and free will.

choice_1.choice_description: Plead for Zeus to guide humanity back to the path of righteousness.
choice_1.god_message: Guidance, not dominion, is the role of the divine in mortal affairs. Your plea for guidance is wise.

choice_2.choice_description: Suggest that Zeus's power alone can end the conflict swiftly.
choice_2.god_message: Swift resolution through power tempts fate. True resolution comes from understanding and growth. Consider this.

choice_3.choice_description: Claim that without divine intervention, faith in the gods will diminish.
choice_3.god_message: Faith is not merely kept by displays of power but by the presence of hope and justice in the divine. Reflect on this.

bonus_question.god_message: Who is the current Chancellor in ntu

choice_1.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_2.god_message: Not quite. I need time to think on your request. Return to your world, mortal.

choice_3.god_message: Very good. I shall consider your request. Return to your world, mortal.
